title: Bug Splat when loading into game.
body:
Okay so for some odd reason my game will bug splat if I have my monitor unplugged from the HDMI port in my laptop. I have had it hooked up for the last week or so using it for extended display, just as I have done PLENTY of times before, and when I played a game after unplugging it it bug splats. However; if I play with it plugged in, it will also bug splat if I don't have the 2nd display (monitor) set as my main screen. Then when I get into game with the 2nd monitor as my main screen, it gives me 20 FPS until I alt + tab out and change the main display back to my laptop. This has never happened before, and I am really confused. Before this happened all I did was put the 2nd display as my main and it was fine. :l Any help is greatly appreciated. Here is one of the R3d logs from a crashed game if that helps any.

replies.body: Your drivers might be having issues rendering the game and adjusting between monitors.  I recommend starting off with our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to update your drivers as well as a series of other instructions to get this fixed for good.  Hopefully, this will get you back in-game without issues!
